assessment_item.title: जोडकर लिखिए।
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mtf","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMTF"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

जोडकर लिखिए।

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"यह सुनकर काउंटर पर","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:4387"},{"text":"मगर, रोबोदीप, यह तो","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:4388"},{"text":"शाम को रोबोनिल","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:4389"},{"text":"दोनों के बीच कुछ","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:4419"},{"text":"सक्सेना परिवार","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":5,"$$hashKey":"object:4429"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"बैठा रोबोट बोला।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"रोबोटिक के नियम के विरुद्","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"और रोबोदीप मिले।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"गुप्त मंत्रणा हुई।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4},{"text":"पाकर फूला नहीं समा रहा था","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":5}],"questionCount":0},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":5,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","title":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Hindi","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Hindi","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MTF"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
assessment_item.name: जोडकर लिखिए।
